data.name: King of Kalimpong
data.detailed_description:
You're a fast-moving minivan with a projectile weapon in this Online Multiplayer PvP Battle Arena. Shoot rocks at your friends and capture their flag. Boost, jump, dodge, and flip to survive. Block projectiles with well-timed kicks, and smash other vehicles to bits when they get in your way.

Shoot

Destroy enemy vehicles with well-timed rocks and missiles.


Smash

Kick, boost, and ground stomp other vehicles to pieces.


Move

Chain vertical and lateral movement together to slip by enemy projectiles, move while airborne, and improve your position while dueling.


Block

Block enemy projectiles with a well-timed roundhouse kick.


Capture

Steal the enemy flag and bring it home to score.


Features:

  • Online Multiplayer play 5v5 PvP Capture the Flag matches with your friends
  • Shoot rocks and missiles to destroy other vehicles
  • Kick other vehicles to pieces with melee attacks
  • Boost to launch your vehicle forward
  • Flip into the air and line up a ground stomp attack
  • Dodge left or right to evade incoming enemy projectiles
  • Block and parry incoming enemy projectiles
  • Drive, jump, bounce, and roll your fast-moving minivan across beautiful landscapes
  • Steal the other team's flag and capture it to win

data.short_description: You're a fast-moving minivan with a projectile weapon in this Online Multiplayer PvP Battle Arena. Shoot rocks at your friends and capture their flag. Boost, jump, dodge, and flip to survive. Block projectiles with well-timed kicks, and smash other vehicles to bits when they get in your way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
